github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use Conventional Commits. Format: <type>(<scope>): <subject>. Types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, build, ci, chore, revert. Use imperative mood. Keep subject <= 72 chars. Infer type/scope from staged changes. If breaking change, include ! and add BREAKING CHANGE: footer.
